title: There are approximately 8,000,000 religions worldwide and all of them claim to have the truth in their pocket. What is right? - Quora

response.answer_text: If there any one that encourages logic and reason, encourages questioning even the most basic 'truth' thoroughly, and makes claims that can be verified without you having to make assumptions or take certain things on faith, I would think that one has it right. For my part, I didn't know there were as many, and am yet to come across one such so I wouldn't be able to tell you if my suppositions above are foolproof but they seem to me the best guides to follow.
